forgot-your-password-text: Enter your email address and we'll send you recovery link with instructions to reset your password.
reset-password-text: Enter and confirm your new password below. Your new password must contain at least 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 symbol and 1 number.
password-error-invalid: Must contain 8 characters. There must be at least 1 Uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 Number and 1 special case character.
